name: Mohammad Javad Amiri
content: Mohammad Javad Amiri Mohammad Amiri Stony Brook University About Me Research Publications Teaching Students Contact Me Download CV © 2019 Mohammad Javad Amiri Short Bio I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Stony Brook University. Before joining Stony Brook, I was a postdoctoral researcher in the Computer and Information Science department at the University of Pennsylvania. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science at the University of California, Santa Barbara and my M.S. and B.S. in Computer Engineering at the Iran University of Science and Technology. My research mainly lies at the intersection of data management and distributed systems, focusing on distributed transaction processing, consensus protocols, and blockchains.
